properties.verseOrder: c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Amkeni waumini nyote (sasa) tupeleke zawadi zetu. Amkeni bila kusita (nyote) tupeleke kwa Mungu wetu .

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Ewe baba ewe mama na nyinyi vijana amkeni nyote tupeleke zawadi kwa Mungu wetu x2.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 1.Simama ee ndugu nenda ukatoe japo kidogo utoe kwa moyo.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: 2.Mungu amekulinda usiku kucha ulikuwa hujui litendekalo peleka zawadi kama shukurani.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: 3.Tutoe zawadi tumwombe Mungu atuzidishie zaidi kwa wingi.
